general.question: Do you really answer after hours?
general.answer: Yes. Our dispatcher rotates on-call duty so urgent calls never go to voicemail. If it's not an emergency, leave a message or schedule online and we’ll confirm first thing in the morning.

general.question: How does your pricing work?
general.answer: After diagnosis we give you straightforward pricing that includes labor, materials, and warranty. If additional work pops up we stop, explain, and get your approval before proceeding.

general.question: What kind of warranty do you offer?
general.answer: Most repairs carry a 12-month labor warranty. Equipment like water heaters or pumps include the full manufacturer warranty, and we handle any paperwork for you.

emergency-plumbing.question: Will you bill my insurance directly?
emergency-plumbing.answer: We collect payment at the time of service and provide a detailed invoice with photos so you can submit for reimbursement. For large losses we’ll coordinate with adjusters.

drain-cleaning.question: Can tree roots be removed without digging?
drain-cleaning.answer: Yes. We mechanically remove roots inside the pipe and offer trenchless options when structural repairs are needed. We'll show you camera footage so you can see the condition.

leak-detection-repair.question: Do you repair slab leaks without jackhammering?
leak-detection-repair.answer: When possible we reroute lines overhead or through walls to avoid breaking concrete. If excavation is required we keep the opening tight and prep it for restoration.

water-heater-install-repair.question: Do you dispose of the old unit?
water-heater-install-repair.answer: Yes, haul-away is always included. We recycle tanks and handle any permit closeout required by your municipality.

sump-pumps.question: Can I monitor the pump from my phone?
sump-pumps.answer: Absolutely. We install smart controllers that send alerts for high water levels, power loss, and maintenance reminders.

faucets-toilets-fixtures.question: Do you work with designers or contractors?
faucets-toilets-fixtures.answer: Yes. We coordinate fixture installs with your remodel schedule and communicate clearly to keep projects on track.
